sentences: Vanasti murdsid kriimsilmad palju lambaid ja varssu.
.. peremees oli hommikul hundirauad kriimsilma p체체dmiseks lepikusse pannud.
context: The word 'murdsid' is the past tense plural form of the verb 'murda' in Estonian. In this context, it means 'broke through', 'attacked', or 'overcame'. The example sentences show that it refers to wolves breaking through barriers to attack sheep and lambs. It describes how predators would overcome obstacles to get to their prey.
